titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 150th anniversary of the Cities of Bristol, Tennessee and Bristol, Virginia.
A resolution celebrating the 150th anniversary of the Cities of Bristol, Tennessee and Bristol, Virginia.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Congratulates the twin cities of Bristol, Tennessee, and Bristol, Virginia, on their sesquicentennial and acknowledges the cultural and historic achievements of the people of such cities.
